transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Haan ji.
Executive: Yes sir, haan abhi aap IndiaMART application open kijiye sir.
Customer: Khol di, khol di maine pehle hi khol di.
Executive: Haan usme na aapko ek niche me na three dots pe click karoge na three sorry three line pe.
Customer: Three line pe click karta hu upar jo hoti hai sir ye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To usme lead by lead aati hai, search by lead, lead manager, manage project ja rahe.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To usme na sir ek aapko aayega buyer tool karke.
Customer: Buyer tools?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Buyer tools ye to kis me aayega ye?
Executive: Three dots pe click karenge na to wahin pe ek option rahega.
Customer: IndiaMART maine IndiaMART jaise open kar diya na. Aur uske baad three jo three sleeping line me usme karna na?
Executive: Haan jahan pe aapka naam dikhta hai na left side me three lines hai wahan pe click kijiye.
Customer: Haan haan kar diya usme.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Usme kya dekhu ab kya search product.
Executive: Wahan pe three lines. Nahi nahi three lines se aap click karoge na to wahan pe aayega.
Customer: Dekhiye aapko dikh raha hoga search product product uske baad browse by industries message uske baad likh raha hoga post your requirement.
Executive: Ek minute requirement likho usme.
Customer: Haan main dekhiye pehle search product hai. Haan manage requirement post your requirement haan sahi hai. Haan post your requirement hai na us pe click kijiye.
Customer: Haan aa gaya enter product name likho okay. Haan yahan pe ab main aapko aapne direct kar dijiye main aapko bata rahi hu wahan pe product name daliye sir.
Executive: Ek minute main dal raha hu. Haan.
Customer: 3 point panel lock.
Executive: Hello 3 point panel lock haan. Isko next next likha hua hai. Haan next haan next pe click kijiye to wahan pe na aapke pass kuch aayega ki matlab kaun sa quantity. Haan wo sab aapko mangega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Upload photos get exactly what you want. Ab usme photo. Haan skip karne ka bhi option hoga aapke pass. Hain? Skip karne ka option hai ya fir wahan pe photos ka wo dikha raha hoga.
Customer: Photo ka dikha raha hai add photo likh raha hai wo.
Executive: Add photos dikh raha hai lekin wahan pe shayad usko skip bhi kar sakte hoge aap.
Customer: Nahi wo to hai mere pass photo hai. Haan to photo upload kar lijiye. Photo add kar dijiye.
Executive: Camera ka. Haan upload kar diya maine theek hai. Haan theek hai uske baad next. Next pe kya aa raha hai uske baad next aa raha hoga.
Customer: Not sure likh raha hai. Next nahi aa raha.
Executive: Photo upload successful nahi ho gaya sahi hai. Haan haan uske baad kya aa raha hai. Last question. Haan uske baad kuch puch raha hoga wo. Is there any other requirement detail like specification usage preference that you had like to tell us.
Executive: Jitna better aap usme specification dalenge na to aapke pass utna matlab better response aayega.
Customer: Achha. Haan to agar hai kuch specification hai to wo add usme kar dijiye.
Executive: Nine long. 3 point lock. 3 point lock for panel. Panel.
Executive: Theek hai ye likh diya maine. Haan. Iske baad. Uske baad fir kya aa raha hai wahan pe. Thank you your post successfully aa gaya likh ke. Haan theek hai wo post ho gaya hai sir theek hai. Sir achha ye to ho gaya aur sir services ko lekar koi dikkat pareshani to nahi aa rahi hai na abhi aapko. Nahi abhi to nahi hai. Muskan le kuch aata lekin buylead bahut kam ho rahi hai jaise na. Lekin fir bhi pehle se to pehle se better hai tumhare pehle jo the wo nahi the kya naam tha aap se pehle kya naam tha unka?
Executive: Ek minute main dekh leti hu. Matlab aap ye bol rahe ho aapke account manager bahut change ho rahe hai. Ab ab haan ab sahi hai pehle se na. Achha. Theek hai. Pehle Mohit ji the aapka jo dekh rahe the. Haan wo thode se unhe thoda samajh kam aati thi. Is field ke ho nahi na. Haan nahi nahi sir new honge is wajah se ye dikkat aa raha hoga koi baat nahi abhi to koi dikkat nahi hai na. Achha ek cheez. Haan ek cheez mujhe dekhna main jaise sir calls aapko jo aa rahi hai na sir wo bahut zyada missed ho raha hai koshish kijiye sir ki calls sara answer kar lein kyunki chaar calls aa rahi hai. Mere pass mere pass receiving jaise mujhe dial karna padta hai mere pass aage samne se bahut kam aati hai. To sir is baar samne se chaar call aaya tha November tak 18 tarikh tak lekin sir aapne sirf ek call answer kiya teen call answer nahi hua hai sir. Nahi wo mera number change ho sakta hai 93 wala isme primary number 89798 hai. Isme aap ye wala aap khud abhi aap ye wala number bhi jis number se aap se baat ho rahi hai nahi ye number bhi aap add kar sakte ho apne usme. To kaise add karu main ise? Haan ek baar application karke karu main edit me hai account jo setting likha hua hai usme edit karu wo number? Haan haan ji. Wo agar aap nikalna chahte hai na to jaise aap apne bete ka number wahan se hatana chahte hai to hata ke apna dal sakte hai. Achha. Haan. Update karu. Haan. Theek hai. Usme dal uska uska second option dal sakte hai? Haan haan bilkul dal sakte hai sir. Aur maine ek dal diya jaise update kar diya maine. Achha ek minute main check kar leti hu. Ek minute update me aa nahi raha. Haan. Mobile should be unique so please enter different mobile number. Achha ye actually aapka us wale number se bhi na ek aapne na company create kar rakha hai. Jo jis number se abhi aap se baat ho rahi hai na usse bhi aapka ek company create ho rakha hai na is wajah se usme primary number me wo add nahi ho sakta hai. Fir? To usko aapko calls chahiye na aapko calls wale me add karna hai na sir. Ab ye wala number dobara se wahi karu likha hua jo hai. Main ye bol rahi hu aapko sirf PNS calls me answer chahiye na yahan pe wo jo yahan pe aap edit kar pa rahe ho. Wo jo log aate hai na. Hello? Jaise unka phone mere pass nahi kar pata hai. Haan wahi main bol rahi hu ki wo aapka kahan se change hoga main wahi bata rahi hu sir ek minute.
Haan ab aap na three lines pe click kijiye pehle. Ek ek minute hello. Haan. Haan bol jaldi bata main baat kar raha hu haan. Arvind Paytm mang raha hai. To payment payment. Kal de payenge kal subah keh rahe. Apne me dalwa le agar fees hogi to usme global se dalwa de payment. Theek hai na?
Kal dale 10 ya 266 to kal hi aayega parso. Ravi ke. Khushi hai. Haan. Dekhiye wo keh raha tha kal ko dal dijiye maine kal parso. Kal dale 15 tarikh ko. Check kar. Bhai aap check kar. Ab aapne check kar main kisi se baat kar raha hu do minute baad baat kar liya dusre. Nahi nahi sir. Nahi mere pass nahi hai kuch bhi nahi hai abhi. Hain 15000. 15 20 15 kara le. 16 kara le. Theek hai na? Hello haan ji. Haan ji sir wahi main bol rahi hu aap dekhiye three lines pe wapas se aap click kijiye. Three lines pe click karenge haan. Ek minute ek minute jaldi baazi mat karo mera phone bada busy rehta hai. Koi baat nahi sir koi baat nahi aap time le lijiye. Ek minute. IndiaMART kahan chala gaya tumhara. IndiaMART pehle open kar lijiye. Chalo main kar raha hu do minute. Main fir back karu usko. Haan aa gaya three lines aa gayi. Three lines pe click kijiye aapko aapka naam dikh raha hoga ekdam niche jana hai sir isko scroll karke niche jaiye wahan pe aa raha hoga privacy account policies uske upar hoga setting last se third option setting dikh raha hoga aapko. Nahi nahi nahi ek minute ek minute jaise piche chala gaya bilkul niche. Setting aa gaya haan. Haan setting pe click kijiye usme dikh raha hoga preferred number setting dikh raha hai PNS PNS setting karke. Haan PNS setting aa rahi hai. Haan us pe click kijiye. PNS setting me jata hu chalo. Haan ab wahan pe click karenge na to aa raha hoga add number. Haan bhai do unhone number likhe hue hai pehle unka likha hua hai change karu use. Save change karu. Save change nahi add number click kar dijiye aap apna number bhi add kar lijiye koi dikkat nahi hai. Usme add hai number hai lekin galti uske pass aati hai mere pass nahi aati. To pehle main kya aata hoga. Dono ke pass aapke pass call aata hoga sir. Ye jo aapka hai na 455 aur 974 dono number pe call aata hai aap just take an example sir ne 455 wale se kisi ne call utha liya to automatic 974 wale pe cut jata hoga agar aap chahte ho ki sirf aapke number pe call aaye to 455 wala hata dijiye wahan pe. Achha. Ab main kya karu ab isko main dikh raha hai na 455 wala to wahan pe na wahan pe. Ab to isme matlab ki main upar nahi kar sakta apna number? Hmm. 93 wala upar nahi kar sakta? Aap usko hata dijiye agar aap chahte ho wo waise hi rahega sir dono pe na barabar call aata hai ek sath call aata hai aisa nahi hai ki wo pehle hai added hai to pehle unko jayega dono ko sath me hi jata hai dono pe. Achha. Haan. Chalo fir kuch change mat karo fir dekhte hai. Haan theek hai. Haan theek hai sir abhi jaise aapka ye concern main close kar du na? Haan haan kar do theek hai. Concern ab sir aapke pass na mail pe na ek feedback aayega satisfied not satisfied ka sir to usme please agar. Satisfied likhunga Muskan ne satisfied kiya hai theek hai. Okay number badh jayenge na tumhare. Theek hai sir okay thank you. Thank you okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants help posting product requirements on IndiaMART.

- Calls are being missed; wants to resolve.

- Account manager changes frequently.



Resolution:

- Guided on how to post product requirements.

- Guided to add the number to PNS settings.

- Explained why the number could not be added.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and update the settings.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, pns calls, account manager
